General.Name: Nation Group (Thailand) PCL
General.Description: Nation Group (Thailand) Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, publishes and distributes newspapers, and provides advertising and news services in Thailand. It operates through Publishing and Advertising and Related Online and Event; and Broadcasting and Related Online and Event segments. The company also engages in television production; and distribution of food and beverage. Further, it provides information through online system. The company was formerly known as Nation Multimedia Group Public Company Limited. Nation Group (Thailand) Public Company Limited was founded in 1971 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.
